definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Hemmingway's study was at the back of the house.
sentences.chinese: 後面一座是海明威的書房。

sentences.english: He may be studding in his study.
sentences.chinese: 他可能正在書房裏學習。

sentences.english: Common areas include a large living and dining room and a library with walls custom-painted to look like wood paneling.
sentences.chinese: 公共區域包括一間大客廳兼餐廳，以及一間書房。

sentences.english: The old servant led Mr Utterson through the laboratory and up some stairs to the doctor's private study above.
sentences.chinese: 老僕人帶他經過實驗室，上樓來到博士的私人書房。

sentences.english: Then there is the picture of Hanna in my father`s study.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個就是漢娜站在我父親書房的畫面。

sentences.english: His library displayed miscellanea of mementos from different parts of the world, a lifetime of traveling.
sentences.chinese: 他書房裏滿是浪跡天涯時，蒐羅來的世界各地紀念品。

sentences.english: Make a study as far as possible some more lightsome .
sentences.chinese: 儘可能地讓書房多一些輕盈。

sentences.english: David, I won't have you play the drum in my study room.
sentences.chinese: 大衛，我不許你在我的書房鼕鼕地不住打鼓。

sentences.english: He came into my study one winter night and caught me quite unawares.
sentences.chinese: 他在一個冬夜闖進我的書房，這相當令我驚訝。

sentences.english: Charles and I were closeted in his study for the briefing session.
sentences.chinese: 我和查爾斯在他的書房裏閉門開簡介會。

sentences.english: She picked orange-colored curtains for the nursery and azure ones for the study.
sentences.chinese: 她爲育嬰房選了橙色的窗簾，爲書房先了天藍的。

sentences.english: He was correcting his proof sheets in his study.
He could hear two men walking around the Upper Library, dusting the bookshelves with fly- whisks .
sentences.chinese: 只聽得兩個人走進書房，揮拂塵四下裏拂拭。

sentences.english: My little sister wrote her homework in the study.
sentences.chinese: 我的小妹妹在書房寫作業。

sentences.english: They convert the study into a nursery when the baby is born.
sentences.chinese: 當嬰兒出生的時候，他們將書房改爲育嬰室。

sentences.english: Jill sat in the library, alone, long after the doctor had gone.
sentences.chinese: 醫生走後，吉爾在書房裏獨坐了很久。

definition: drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
to enter a door/to go in/to learn the basics of a subject/to join one's husband's household upon marriage
